summary: The world’s most prolific crypto thieves have used Sinbad.io to launder tens of millions. Its creator, “Mehdi,” answers WIRED’s questions.
title: Meet the Creator of North Korea’s Favorite Crypto Privacy Service
detailed_content: IN THE CRYPTOCURRENCY economy, there's often a fine line between financial privacy and money laundering. Now one Bitcoin "mixer" service called Sinbad.io is walking that tightrope in full public view: Just a few months after launching on the open web, it appears to have already become the preferred money-laundering outlet for the world's most prolific state-sponsored crypto thieves.
author: BY ANDY GREENBERG
